version_description:
Fixed part of the tutorial
Bug fixes

・Fixed a display bug in the status screen.
・Add gem acquisition reward video.
・Gasoline recovery reward video added.
・Ad SDK fixed.
・In-app purchase SDK fixed.
・iPhone X and above screen size support.
・Reduced the size of BGM files.
・Game Center SDK is outdated and has been closed.
Fixed an issue that caused interstitial ads to be displayed when Rewarded Ad should have been displayed.
